article: berlin , february # -lrb- xinhua -rrb- - germany finds good chance for its candidate to succeed french michel camdessus as next international monetary fund -lrb- imf -rrb- chief , a cabinet spokeswoman wednesday said in berlin .
abstract: german imf candidate sees good chance government spokeswoman
